panels.description: Status of the daos_exporter. "Down" means port 9191 of the remote server is unreachable, while the server engines may in good states.
panels.title: Exporter Status

panels.description: Total server and rank numbers in the system.
panels.title: Server Statistics

panels.description: Amount of resident memory size in bytes.
panels.title: Server resident memory

panels.description: Time since the engine became ready.
panels.title: Engine uptime

panels.description: Average RPC update/write processing time by host.
panels.title: Write processing time

panels.description: Average RPC fetch/read processing time by host.
panels.title: Read processing time

panels.description: Total number of bytes read.
panels.title: Write bytes

panels.description: Total number of bytes read.
panels.title: Read bytes

panels.description: Total number of processed object RPCs.
panels.title: Write RPCs

panels.description: Total number of processed object RPCs.
panels.title: Read RPCs

panels.description: Number of write commands completed by to the controller.
panels.title: NVMe write commands

panels.description: Number of read commands completed by to the controller.
panels.title: NVMe read commands

panels.description: Ranks of current node
panels.title: Local ranks

panels.description: Number of OS threads created.
panels.title: OS threads

panels.description: Percentage of used NVMe capacity by disk PCIe addresses.
panels.title: NVMe usage

panels.description: Number of errors reported to the engine on different categories of commands.
panels.title: NVMe erors

panels.description: Total number of timed out requests.
panels.title: Timeouts

panels.description: Number of open files.
panels.title: Open file number

panels.description: Percentage of open files.
panels.title: Open file percentage

panels.description: Number of dead rank events received.
panels.title: Dead rank events

panels.description: Number of frab buffer errors.

panels.description: Current SSD temperature in Celsius.
